title: Ford unveils new Lincoln Nautilus to be imported from China
description: The vehicle is currently produced for the U.S. at a Canadian plant, where the automaker recently said it would invest about $1.3 billion for EV production.

title: Alphabet shares dip on report Samsung phones may switch to Microsoft Bing search
description: The move could cost Google billions in advertising revenue and reportedly shocked employees, given Samsung's longtime relationship with Google.

title: How to set up Apple's new savings account on an iPhone
description: The Apple Savings account can take up to $250,000 in deposits, which are insured by the FDIC.

title: Ryan Reynolds breaks down the investing strategy that has made him millions: 'My job is storytelling'
description: The 46-year-old actor announced Monday that he has invested in Canadian payments giant Nuvei.

title: Crypto stablecoins might need limits to avoid disruptions to financial stability, warns Bank of England
description: Volatility in the crypto markets raised questions about just how stable so-called stabelcoins like Tether's USDT, Circle's USDC and Binance's BNB truly are.

title: Some travel is 'off the charts' expensive, experts say. Here are 3 ways to cut some costs
description: The travel boom in 2023 is fueling higher prices, especially for hotels and international flights. But there's hope for a good deal, experts said.

title: Since June, Feds have seized nearly $1 billion in goods tied to forced labor
description: Companies are losing millions of dollars while their goods remain in custody at ports.

title: Apple launches its savings account with 4.15% interest rate
description: Apple on Monday said its Apple Card savings account is now available to users with a 4.15% annual percentage yield.

title: The chip industry's open secret: Adversaries' military tech relies on U.S. components
description: Semiconductor makers and government officials acknowledge the unauthorized use of American chips is a serious issue, but experts can't agree on who is to blame.

title: UK identifies several areas to scour for vital rare earth metals in push for minerals sovereignty
description: Critical raw materials can be used to make the batteries and semiconductors that are vital to the global shift away from fossil fuels.

title: Volkswagen reveals the ID.7, new flagship EV with more than 300 miles of range
description: Volkswagen's new ID.7 will serve as a flagship for the automaker's growing line of mainstream EVs.

title: Sweden's economic gloom goes from bad to worse as government predicts steeper GDP contraction
description: The Swedish government predicted 2023 would be a "gloomy" year for the country, but new GDP expectations present a worse outlook than previously expected.

title: Sega to acquire Angry Birds maker Rovio for $776 million
description: Shares of Finland's Rovio Entertainment soared on news of the offer.

title: Hydrogen, fully electric, or both? Heavy-duty trucking has some big decisions to make
description: Efforts to decarbonize the freight sector will have to be ramped up in the years ahead.

title: Asia's growth will outpace both the U.S. and Europe this year, Morgan Stanley says
description: Three other large Asian economies, including India, Indonesia and Japan, are also showing robust domestic demand, added the economist.

title: Google CEO Sundar Pichai warns society to brace for impact of A.I. acceleration, says ‘it’s not for a company to decide'
description: The executive told "60 Minutes" that the technology is moving fast and "it’s not for a company to decide."
